Name: Gateball VR
About the game: Realize outdoor gateball sports in VR! Easy game play for all ages, old, middle, young, and minor 4 stages of realistic outdoor scenes (park day / night, beach day / night) Play from 1 to 5 players on a single device It is easy to experience the gate ball, which is known to be effective in preventing dementia and depression in the elderly, through VR.
